body:
#### PR description:
This PR:
- Integrates the `EcalSimComponentShapeRcd` record in the MC GTs introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40855 by updating the 
  - Phase1 GTs with tag `EcalSimComponentShape_PhaseI`
  - Phase2 GT with tag `EcalSimComponentShape_PhaseII`
  as requested in this [CMS Talk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/add-new-conditions-ecalsimcomponentshape-in-gt-for-improved-digi-simulation/21448) [1]. 
- In addition, with this PR also removes the TkAl Records from the Phase2 MC GT, since the tracker alignment is switched off by default in all Phase-2 geometries. More details and the original request can be found in this [CMS Talk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/phase-1-tracker-alignment-tags-in-phase-2-global-tags/21264) [2].


[1] https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/add-new-conditions-ecalsimcomponentshape-in-gt-for-improved-digi-simulation/21448
[2] https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/phase-1-tracker-alignment-tags-in-phase-2-global-tags/21264/2

#### PR validation:
- The ECAL changes tested locally with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40855 using 
 `runTheMatrix.py -l 25.0,8.0 -j10 --ibeos` 
- The TkAl Record removal was tested locally with
`runTheMatrix.py -l 22034.0,25234.0,24834.0 -j10 --ibeos`
- The PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40855 should be tested with this.
